headline: Bristol-Myers Squibb (NYSE:BMY) Sees Rising Interest in Sotyktu Despite 3% Share Price Dip
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb (NYSE:BMY) recently announced positive topline results from its Phase 3 trials for Sotyktu, generating increased interest from rheumatologists despite some skepticism on efficacy metrics. This announcement, along with the European Commission's approval of Breyanzi for non-Hodgkin lymphoma treatment and Opdivo's approval for liver cancer treatment, could have influenced investor sentiment, contributing to a 2.12% price increase for the company over the last quarter. These...
